org.wise.vle.web

Class SecurityUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wise.vle.web.SecurityUtils

  • @Component
public final class SecurityUtils
extends Object
    Utility class mostly for checking permissions (authorization) to access certain resources
    Author:
    Patrick Lawler

      • isPortalMode

        public static boolean isPortalMode(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Given a HttpServletRequest request, makes a request to the mode master to determine if the calling servlet should run in portal mode or stand-alone. Returns true if the settings.xml specifies that it is in portal mode, false otherwise.

        Returns:
